description: This is a C++ unit test source file using Google Test framework, testing the 'OptionalType' class in the WPEFramework namespace, specifically in the Core sub-namespace. The tests cover construction, assignment, comparison, and value access for the OptionalType template class.

classes.name: OptionalType
classes.description: A template class representing an optional value that can be set or unset, supporting comparison, assignment, and value retrieval.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Clears the optional value, setting it to an unset state.

methods.name: IsSet
methods.description: Checks whether a value has been set.

methods.name: Value
methods.description: Retrieves the stored value, possibly throwing if unset.
